articles.description: THE MATCH Somerset face Kent at The Spitfire Ground, Canterbury in the LV= Insurance County Championship Division One match of the season this week. Play will get underway at 10:30am tomorrow (Monday September 26th). BUY TICKETS 2022 COUNTY CHAMPIONSHIP EXPLA…

articles.title: World Superbikes: Alvaro Bautista extends championship lead hat-trick of wins in Barcelona - BBC
articles.description: Alvaro Bautista completes a hat-trick of wins at the Catalunya World Superbike round with a comfortable victory in race two.
articles.content:
Spaniard Bautista now has a 59-point championship lead
Alvaro Bautista completed a hat-trick of wins at the Catalunya World Superbike round with a comfortable victory in race two to extend his champ… [+1628 chars]

articles.title: Northern Ireland 2-1 Kosovo: A 'big sigh' for Baraclough as Windsor Park erupts - BBC
articles.description: After a 'big sigh', Ian Baraclough has called on his Northern Ireland team to back up Saturday's last-gasp victory over Kosovo at Windsor Park.
articles.content:
Josh Magennis' superb injury-time header completed the comeback win for Northern Ireland
